mapper.select: select p.rank, a.title, p.popularOid, a.img from article a, popularnews p where a.oid = p.popularOid and a.aid = p.popularAid and p.popularSid =0
mapper.insert: insert into summary (id, art_oid, art_aid, userid, content, like, hate, time) values ( #{id}, #{art_oid}, #{art_aid}, #{userid}, #{content}, #{like}, #{hate}, #{time} )
